sentences.sContent: Here is the consequence of being buried alive: she has thrown herself away upon that boor from sheer ignorance that better individuals existed!
sentences.sContent_eng: Here is the consequence of being buried alive: she has thrown herself away upon that boor from sheer ignorance that better individuals existed!
sentences.sCn: 这就是隐居的结果：她把自己胡乱嫁给了一个粗俗的农民，全然不知还有更好的人存在！

synos.tran: 农民；粗野的人；不懂礼貌的人

remMethod.val: 粗野的人(boor)的人通常比较穷(poor)

words.tran: 粗野的；粗鲁的；粗鄙的；笨拙的；乡土气的

trans.tranOther: a man who behaves in a very rude way
